subject: Negotiation
title: Planning Your Concessions
description: Learn Planning Your Concessions in one minute.

hook.text: Giving in too fast makes them suspicious. Too slow makes them walk away.

buildup.text: Concession strategy means planning what you'll give up, when, and how much.

discovery.text: Start with smaller concessions and slow down near your limit â€” it signals firmness.

twist.text: Never concede without getting something back. Free concessions train them to push harder.

climax.text: The pattern of your concessions tells them more than your words ever will.

punchline.text: Every 'yes' should cost them something too.

quiz.question: What is the best concession strategy?
options: Give large concessions early to build goodwill
Start small and slow down, always getting something in return
